pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 教区牧師は法話の時しばしば聖書に言及する。
lessons.english: The vicar often refers to the Bible in his sermon.

lessons.japanese: その牧師は貧乏人のために懸命に働いた。
lessons.english: The minister worked hard on behalf of the poor.

lessons.japanese: その牧師は今週３組の結婚式を行った。
lessons.english: The clergyman has married three couples this week.

lessons.japanese: その少女は、目を閉じて牧師の話を聞いた。
lessons.english: The girl, closing her eyes, listened to the pastor.

lessons.japanese: すべての牧師が新しい法律に反対である。
lessons.english: All the clergy are against the new law.

lessons.japanese: ジャックとペギーの結婚式はジョン・スミス牧師により行われた。
lessons.english: Jack and Peggy were married by the Rev. John Smith.

lessons.japanese: キング牧師は首を撃たれ、後方に倒れた。
lessons.english: Rev. King fell backwards, shot in the neck.

lessons.japanese: キング牧師と彼の支持者は脅迫された。
lessons.english: Rev. King and his supporters were threatened.

lessons.japanese: ４０代になるまでは牧師になるべきではない。
lessons.english: A man shouldn't be a pastor until he's in his forties.
